pageProduct.name: Alya Skin Foaming Micellar Cleanser 135ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

All in one foaming cleanser that removes makeup, cleanses and refreshes the skin. 

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of direct sunlight. Avoid contact with eyes and mouth area. If irritations occurs, cease use. 

Common Uses

The Alya Skin Foaming Micellar Cleanser is infused with Watermellon Seed & Essential Rose Oil to help rejuvenate, hydrate and cleanse the skin. It is perfect for everyday use and safe for sensitive skin. Our unique formula is gentle on the skin, is made in Australia and best of all, we are vegan & cruelty free!
This product should be used daily to remove make-up and prior to using the Alya Skin Pomegranate Exfoliator.

Ingredients

Aqua, Lauryl glucoside, Hamamelis virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Coco-glucoside,
Cocamidopropyl betaine, Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon) seed oil, Pelargonium roseum (Rose geranium) stem oil, Glyceryl oleate, Alcohol, Sodium chloride, Sodium benzoate, Potassium sorbate, Citric acid, CI17200. Plant derived

Directions

1) Wet face with warm water.
2) Pump foam into hands.
3) Gently remove make-up and cleanse skin rubbing in circular motions whilst rinsing your face with water.
